channel.title: Dreams on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Dreams on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Dream Flies
item.description:
So I got a random dream some days ago. In a dream I smoked (which IRL I didn’t do for a number of years). Then a bunch of flies showed up and some got stuck to my hand and one even got into my nose forcing me to forcefully breath-out.

I like how my brain is smart and has intervened in this direct manner.

item.title: The City
item.description:
So I have rememberead a dream. And even though I don’t have intuitive inclanation to pay attention to it, it is a rare occasion and one aspect got me interested so I have paid some attention.

Anyway theme-wise it was like going for something and random situations happen in between. I remembered that the city is so well known to me like it is definetly not the first time I’m here and I know places even though it is not a specific real-world place.
